title: K-12 Personalized Adaptive Mathematics Instructional Design: Needs-Based Learning Management

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Customized learning sequences for pre-service/in-service teachers to enhance mathematics instructional competencies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their instructional context requirements to design personalized learning pathways
Learners can select mathematics teaching strategies (concept explanation, problem-solving, etc.) using an adaptive learning management system
Learners can diagnose and improve personalized learning effectiveness through formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
